alert.note: Alert for Arthur; Keith (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 5:09PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Arthur, south central Grant, northwestern Keith and southeastern Garden Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 409 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles west of Arthur, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Arthur, Haythorn Lake, Jensen Lake, Bucktail Lake, Bourquim Hill, Sand Puddin Lake, Velma and McKeag. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 112 and 143. Highway 92 between mile markers 117 and 119, and between mile markers 165 and 173. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
